definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: cry, cry out, call (‖ form of [[חעק]] q.v.; Ar. za9aqa, Aram. z9aq)—
call, to one's aid, sq. acc. pers. Ju Jdg 12:2.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: unto God (´[[י]]), sq. [[אֶל־]] Ju Jdg 3:9, Jdg 3:15, Jdg 6:6, Jdg 6:7, Jdg 10:10, 1Sa 7:8, 1Sa 7:9 (+ [[בעד]] of intercession), 1Sa 12:8, 1Sa 12:10, 1Sa 15:11, Mic 3:4, Je 11:11, Hb Hab 1:2 (c. acc. [[חמס]], cf. Ho 8:2 infr.), 2Ch 20:9, Ps 22:6, Ps 107:13, Ps 107:19, Ps 142:6, Joe 1:14; sq. ´[[אֶל־י]] + [[בְּקוֹל גׇּדוֹל]] Ne 9:4; + [[קוֹלִי]] Ps 142:2 (‖[[התחנן]]); + [[בְּלִבָּם]] Ho 7:14 (opp. [[הֵילִיל]]); sq. [[לְ]] Ho 8:2 (+ obj. of words uttered), 1Ch 5:20; sq. sf. Ne 9:28; sq. [[הַשָּׁמַיִם]] (without divine name) 2Ch 32:20 (‖[[התפלל]]); abs., but with implication of cry to ´[[י]] 1Sa 8:18, Is 30:19.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: unto other gods, sq. [[אֶל־]] Ju Jdg 10:14, Je 11:12, Jon 1:5.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: abs., utterance of horror, anxiety, alarm, distress, sorrow, etc. 1Sa 4:13, 1Sa 5:10, 1Sa 28:12 (+ [[בקול גדול]]), 2Sa 13:19, 2Sa 19:5 (+ [[קול גדול]]), 1Ki 22:32 = 2Ch 18:31, Is 15:4, Is 26:17, Is 57:13, Je 20:8 (‖[[קרא]], cf. Hb Hab 1:2 supr.), La 3:8 (‖[[אֲשַׁוֵּעַ]]) Ez Eze 9:8, Eze 11:13, Eze 27:30; also of cry heard by God Ex 2:23 (P); sq. [[לְ]] of that in behalf of, or for which one cries Is 15:5, Je 48:31; so sq. [[עַל־]] Je 30:15; sq. acc. cogn. [[זְעָקָה]] Es 4:1; ‖[[היליל]] Je 47:2; and esp. Imv. Is 14:31, Je 25:34, Je 48:20, Ez Eze 21:17.

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: cry out against one, sq. [[עַל־]] Job 31:38 if my land cry out against me (‖[[יִבְכָּיוּן]]); cf. also (abs., and without prep.) Hb Hab 2:11 the stone shall cry out of  ([[מִן]]) the wall.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. 2 ms. [[נִזְעָָקְתָּ]] Ju Jdg 18:23; 3 mpl. [[נִזְעֲקוּ]] Ju Jdg 18:22; Impf. [[וַיִּזׇּעֵק]] Ju Jdg 6:34 + 2 t.; [[וַיִּזׇּעֲקוּ]] Jos 8:16; —be called together, assemble, join Jos 8:16 (JE), Ju Jdg 18:22, Jdg 18:23, 1Sa 14:20; sq. [[אַחֲרָיו]] Ju Jdg 6:34, Jdg 6:35 assembled after him, i.e. joined him as his followers.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. [[וַיַּזְעֵק]] Ju Jdg 4:10 + 3 t.; [[יַזְעִיקוּ]] Job 35:9; Imv. [[הַזְעֶק־]] 2Sa 20:4; Inf. cstr. [[לְהַזְעִיק]] 2Sa 20:5; —
call, call out, or together, for military service, sq. acc. Ju Jdg 4:10, Jdg 4:13, 2Sa 20:4, 2Sa 20:5.
make a crying Job 35:9 ([[יְשַׁוְּעוּ]] in ‖ cl.)
call out to, or at, sq. acc. [[וַיַּזְעֵק אׂתִי וַיְדַבֵּר]] Zec 6:8 (si vera l.; Gr queries [[וַיׇּעַר]] ?).
